function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impact on urban areas","Impact":"Disruption of everyday life, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and preparedness planning","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote healthcare technology, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Residents of urban areas, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Imbalanced coverage of major impact themes","Impact":"Limited understanding of socio-economic and governance impacts","Mitigation":"Enhanced data collection and analysis, research funding for underrepresented themes","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, urban surveillance systems, public opinion tracking technology","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in impact and response mechanisms across contexts","Impact":"Inability to provide identical recommendations for different cities","Mitigation":"Context-specific research and analysis, flexible and adaptable response strategies","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, real-time data tracking systems, communication technology","People":"City officials, emergency response teams, public health experts","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations"}]}
